subtitle: when Aaron Rodgers went down in the
fourth play when you look at the video
you see
millions of people praying prayers for
Aaron the New York Post put it but is it
really a demonstration of Faith but I
would like to believe especially in
these days
as we prepare for the Hebrew New Year
which is really a universal New Year a
collective birthday of the human race
that subconsciously there is in each one
of us
even in the skeptic
a certain hope
and as we go into Rosh Hashanah that's a
very powerful message because for many
prayers become something robotic
mechanical lip service
but there's another side to it
and perhaps this wakes us up to that
other side and that is that we do have a
soul
and that we do believe and we do have
hope sometimes against hope
that things will turn out better
even if we can't really understand
naturally how that will be
